name: HighwayChicken
description:
You're a chicken on a run. Better poop your way out!

Use an XBOX controller!

[A] to poop.
[Stick] to move.

[alt + f4] to quit for now :D

Chicken Model:

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/characters/animals/meshtint-free-chicke...

Police Car:

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/vehicles/land/low-poly-police-car-pack-...

Truck:

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/vehicles/land/free-pickup-truck-with-ba...
